item.title: Markdown Formatting Demo
item.description: This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- test.. test… test….. test?….. test!…. !!!!!! ???? ,, – — “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text

item.title: Grid Quantum Propagator
item.description: This package is capable of propagating a 3D wavepacket in many electronic states, taking into account the coupling between states and with an external field. We used this program in order to study the [2+2]photo-cycloaddition of Norbornadiene, one of the most promising reactions for the purpose of stocking solar or thermal energy, capable of storing a significant amount of energy (ΔH = 89 kJ/mol). This new program allowed to study this system after the electronic excitation triggered by several different external pulses.

item.title: Retropaths
item.description:
In this high throughput chemistry software, molecules are treated as graphs, and templates describe a chemical reaction in terms of its core structure, the edge edits and “R” groups, which are wild cards. Importantly, the use of graph theory ensures that the template generates all possible regioisomers.
However, a chemical reaction can be composed of more than one step, and it can be accompanied by side reactions. That is why we introduce the concept of a reaction pot, which consists of reagents and environment molecules along with reaction conditions.

item.title: Semiclassical Molecular Dynamics
item.description: In my collaboration with OpenMolcas I have implemented tools to perform semiclassical molecular dynamics. This allow us to study photoactive proteins, as in the following video. Your browser does not support the video tag.
